price: यदि हम चाहें, तो अवश्य उसे चूर-चूर कर दें, फिर तुम आश्चर्य करते रह जाओ।
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu lajaʿalnāhu ḥuṭāman faẓaltum tafakkahūna
